Posts.Content: Oct 16, 2009 02:26AM - edited Oct 16, 2009 02:28AM by AnnaG Hi Tagreen, I am in the "what the hell is going on?" boat too, and here is what I found on blood tests on the breastcancer.org site: http://www.breastcancer.org/symptoms/testing/types/blood_marker.jsp I've been wondering too - I had some blood tests last year because of extreme fatigue that wouldn't go away, and it all came back shiny. I don't know if they tested for cancer markers or not, though.
